content.text:
# Draft:Central Ohio Film Critics Association Awards for Best Animated Feature

----
}}
The Central Ohio Film Critics Association Awards for Best Animated Feature is an award given by the Central Ohio Film Critics Association Awards to honor an outstanding animated film since 2006.
